class OcclusionAwareGenerator[source]

OcclusionAwareGenerator(num_channels, num_kp, block_expansion, max_features, num_down_blocks, num_bottleneck_blocks, estimate_occlusion_map=False, dense_motion_params=None, estimate_jacobian=False) :: Module

Transforms a source image according to movement trajectories induced by keypoints. Generator follows Johnson architecture.
